Title: Root out the Hu Feng counter-revolutionary clique exhibition cartoons 20
Publisher: Shanghai renmin meishu chubanshe (上海人民美术出版社)
Notes: Most of the cartoons of a set of 20 posters, published during the anti-Hu Feng movement, cannot be linked to any of the 17 designers mentioned on the opening sheet. This 20th one, however, has been signed by Mi Gu (lower left corner).The text on the chest of the person in the garbage truck reads "Hu Feng Clique"; the text in the street reads "All counter-revolutionaries".
